==Software repository==
â
In addition to the official Ubuntu repositorires, Super OS also includes its own repositories,<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS_repository hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS_repository]</ref> which include third-party software like [[Adobe Reader]], [[Skype]], [[Real Player]], [[NeroLinux]] (trial), [[TrueCrypt]], [[Google Chrome]] or [[Ubuntu calendar]], but also include tools/software developed by ''hacktolive'', like App Runner and [[RUNZ]].<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/runz hacktolive.org/runz]</ref>
+
In addition to the official Ubuntu repositorires, Super OS also includes its own repositories,<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS_repository hacktolive.org/wiki/Super_OS_repository]</ref> which include third-party software like [[Adobe Reader]], [[Skype]], [[Real Player]], [[NeroLinux]] (trial), [[TrueCrypt]], [[PeaZip]], [[Google Chrome]] or [[Ubuntu calendar]], but also include tools/software developed by ''hacktolive'', like App Runner and [[RUNZ]].<ref>[http://hacktolive.org/runz hacktolive.org/runz]</ref>
